mods.abstract: CBS radio program It Pays To Be Ignorant, as broadcast August 23, 1946 (part 1) by station WHIO (Dayton, OH). Featuring announcer Ken Roberts; host Tom Howard; cast members Harry McNaughton, Lulu McConnell, and George Shelton; and musicians Harry Salter and the Philip Morris Orchestra, and Ray Porter's Esquires.
